unnormalised: ## Automotive News: Traffic Got You Down? New Rules Incoming!
normalised: ## Automotive News: Traffic Got You Down? New Rules Incoming!

unnormalised: Looks like Bangalore traffic is about to get *slightly* less insane (we hope!). The Transport Ministry just announced a raft of new traffic regulations, supposedly to ease congestion before the Onam rush hits.
normalised: Looks like Bangalore traffic is about to get *slightly* less insane (we hope!). The Transport Ministry just announced a raft of new traffic regulations, supposedly to ease congestion before the Onam rush hits.

unnormalised: Word on the street is stricter enforcement of lane discipline is top priority. They're even talking about hefty fines, like Rs. 5000 for cutting lanes near Silk Board! Ouch!
normalised: Word on the street is stricter enforcement of lane discipline is top priority. They're even talking about hefty fines, like rupee five thousand for cutting lanes near Silk Board! Ouch!

unnormalised: Also, expect more speed cameras popping up on the Hosur Road stretch. Seems like they're cracking down on speed demons doing over 80 kmph.
normalised: Also, expect more speed cameras popping up on the Hosur Road stretch. Seems like they're cracking down on speed demons doing over eighty kilometer per hour.

unnormalised: And get this: they're seriously considering implementing a 'biryani hour' ban for delivery bikes in certain areas during peak times. Apparently, all that frantic biryani delivery contributes to the chaos.
normalised: And get this: they're seriously considering implementing a 'biryani hour' ban for delivery bikes in certain areas during peak times. Apparently, all that frantic biryani delivery contributes to the chaos.

unnormalised: Whether these rules will actually work? That’s anybody’s guess. But hey, maybe we can all at least *pretend* to drive properly for a week or two. Wish us luck, folks! We're gonna need it navigating these choc-a-bloc roads. Jai Hind!
normalised: Whether these rules will actually work? That’s anybody’s guess. But hey, maybe we can all at least *pretend* to drive properly for a week or two. Wish us luck, folks! We're gonna need it navigating these choc-a-bloc roads. Jai Hind!
